mapper.select: select r.reply_num, m.member_nick, r.reply_content, r.reply_time, r.reply_singo_flag from board b, reply r, member m where b.board_num = r.board_num and m.member_id = b.member_id and b.board_num = #{boardNum} order by r.reply_time
mapper.insert: insert into reply(reply_num, board_num, member_id, reply_content, reply_time, reply_singo_flag) VALUES(reply_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{boardNum}, #{memberId}, #{replyContent}, SYSTIMESTAMP, 0)
